import.title: Import Contacts
import.description: Upload a CSV or Excel file to bulk import contacts into your CRM.

fileUpload.title: Upload File
fileUpload.description: Upload a CSV or Excel file containing your contacts.
fileUpload.dropZone: Drop your file here, or click to browse

columnMapping.title: Map Columns
columnMapping.description: Map each column from your file to a CRM field, or skip columns you don't need.

previewStep.title: Preview & Validate
previewStep.description: Review the mapped data before importing.

strategies.skipDescription: Existing contacts with matching emails will be left unchanged.
strategies.overwriteDescription: Existing contacts with matching emails will be updated with the new data.
strategies.create_anywayDescription: All rows will be imported as new contacts, even if emails match.

result.title: Import Complete
result.flaggedDescription: Some imported contacts have incomplete data or missing signals. You can review them in the Data Quality queue.

enrichment.pageDescription: Monitor data staleness and review proposed updates for your contacts.
enrichment.stalenessDescription: Contacts sorted by staleness score. Review those with the highest scores first.
enrichment.title: Data Enrichment
enrichment.description: Review contacts with stale data and manage enrichment proposals.
